resources.string: Take a city break and discover the beauty of Indonesia nature. Enjoy the beautyful scenery to calm yourself and find your peace at The Beauty of Indonesia nature.

My name is Aditya Purnama, i am final year student at Sekolah Tinggi Teknologi Bandung and currently my GPA is 2.9. I love playing game especially puzzle games and adventure games since i was in elementary school, and i think that is the reason why i love programming especially in android, because when i play puzzle game i need to solve the problem to finish it and in programming it is also like that too
